nodes.text: R4-H18 was an R4-series agromech droid that had a translucent white body with silver highlights. The droid worked serving drinks to guests at the Canto Casino on Canto Bight. He was equipped with a drink tray as well as a liquid dispenser arm that could fill glasses it carried.
This holiday-themed droid is a toy that was made available exclusively at Disney Parks in 2018.
